Application requires GPS function, please open the location service to continue. In order to use the software normally, please Allow read and write contacts Allow microphone Allow to read mobile phone information Allow location information Allow files to read and write Allow Bluetooth Allow to modify phone settings Please go to system settings grant app permission Motion permission setting Due to power saving settings and background process restrictions, Android may close the %1$s recording sports or cause some sports recording data to be missing. If you encounter relevant problems, you can refer to the following methods. Display (suspended window) settings on other applications In order to ensure that you will not be killed by the mobile phone system during exercise, resulting in the loss of exercise data, please grant the %1$s floating window permission Open floating window permission Battery optimization In power saving mode, the operation of the %1$s may still be limited. When starting the movement, try to keep the power in a relatively sufficient state and turn off the power saving mode. The related settings entry is generally in the status bar or battery related settings. Battery optimization has been turned on. Click close Battery optimization turned off Background protection settings Adding the %1$s to the background protection list can help the %1$s run continuously in the background to a certain extent. \n Setting method: Turn on background protection system settings Power saving mode Due to the power saving setting of the system, the app will be frozen. To ensure that background activities such as recording motion data are not affected, please add %1$s to the battery optimization white list. Turn on anti sleep system settings Lock screen display Setting method: application information - > permission management - > lock screen display Instructions for use Camera Permissions Bluetooth Permissions Location Permissions Storage Permissions Read contact information permission Used to scan, set avatar, set custom watch face background and other functions. Used to search and connect Bluetooth devices, communicate with Bluetooth devices and other functions. Used for Bluetooth function, weather information, map positioning, motion trajectory and other functions. Used to read music files, set avatars, read galleries and other functions. Used to synchronize contact information to the device. If you refuse to enable it, you will not be able to use the above functions.

User agreement Privacy policy
Current version:%1$s Agree Refuse "Privacy Policy" "User Services Agreement" %1$s Declaration
"%1$s" is a software used to record and analyze user sports health data, provide users with professional sports health guidance and smart wearable device management services. In order to achieve the above purpose, When we provide you with services, we may need to collect your relevant information and use the following permissions: use camera, use location information, use Bluetooth permission, Read your calendar, read your contacts, access the web. We need to synchronize your heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen, exercise records and other exercise data to the cloud. We attach great importance to your privacy protection and personal information protection. Before you use the "%2$s" APP, please read #### and all the terms of **** carefully, and start using us after you agree and accept all the terms services.
I have read and agree to the #### and **** Please read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy!

When "Automatic Pressure Detection" is turned on, the device will intelligently judge your active status. If it is judged to be at rest, your heart rate variability will be detected and pressure will be calculated. During exercise, automatic pressure detection is not performed. To ensure correct detection, please wear the device correctly. Relax Normal Medium Too high, it is recommended to manage the pressure reasonably Heart rate measurement method Intelligent Dynamically adjust the measurement frequency according to your exercise status, and intelligently monitor your heart rate 24 hours a day, which helps to save power 24-hour real-time monitoring of your heart rate, heart rate data is more detailed, refreshed more timely, and has a great impact on power consumption RealTime Maximum heart rate Heart rate upper limit warning Alert when heart rate is higher than %1$d beats/min

Please%1$s turn on address book permission to use this function normally This feature requires your location information.
